analyzed: smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis /
translated: and not a designation of the conditioned.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
translated: “Subhūti, excellent, excellent!🔽Subhūti, in that way, bodhisattva mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of wisdom do not apprehend a designation of form,

original: rab 'byor de ltar @119b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs kyi tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes kyi tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar @119b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs kyi tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes kyi tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: do not apprehend a designation of feeling, do not apprehend a designation of perception,

original: 'du byed rnams kyi tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /🔽bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyi tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang /
translated: the designation of formations is non-apprehensible, the designation of consciousness is non-apprehensible, the designation of form as permanent or impermanent is non-apprehensible, the designation of form as blissful or suffering is non-apprehensible,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bde ba dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bde ba dang /
translated: the designation of form as a self or not a self is non-apprehensible, the designation of form as empty or not empty is non-apprehensible, the designation of form as with signs or signless is non-apprehensible, the designation of form as having aspirations or lacking aspirations is non-apprehensible, the designation of feeling as permanent or impermanent is non-apprehensible, the designation of feeling as blissful or suffering is non-apprehensible,

original: sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /🔽mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the words ‘suffering’ and ‘not suffering,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘self’ and ‘non-self,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘calm’ and ‘not calm,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘empty’ and ‘not empty,’🔽the non-apprehension of the words ‘sign’ and ‘signless,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘wish’ and ‘wishless,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘perception’ and ‘imperception,’

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang /
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the words ‘permanent’ and ‘impermanent,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘happy’ and ‘unhappy,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘self’ and ‘non-self,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘calm’ and ‘not calm,’ the non-apprehension of the words ‘empty’ and ‘not empty,’

original: mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed rnams rtag pa dang /
analyzed: mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed rnams rtag pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the words ‘permanent’ and ‘impermanent’ in regard to compounded things,

original: mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bde ba dang / @120a * //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bde ba dang / @120a * //
translated: the non-apprehension of the words ‘happiness’ and ‘suffering,’🔽the non-apprehension of the words ‘self’ and ‘selfless,’🔽the non-apprehension of the words ‘peaceful’ and ‘not peaceful,’

original: sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the words ‘empty’ and ‘not empty,’

original: mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the terms with signs and signless, the terms with aspirations and without aspirations, the terms of consciousness as permanent and impermanent,

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang /
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa dang /
translated: the terms of happiness and suffering, the terms of self and no self, the terms of peace and not peace, the terms of emptiness and not empty,

original: mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: mi stong pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dags mi dmigs pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: “One should train in the perfection of wisdom by not apprehending the designation ‘empty’ and the designation ‘not empty,’ by not apprehending the designation ‘with signs’ and the designation ‘signless,’ and by not apprehending the designation ‘having wishes’ and the designation ‘wishless.’ ”

original: rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du bdag gis chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du bdag gis chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, you said, ‘I do not see that dharma called a bodhisattva,🔽so how can I teach it?’🔽Subhūti, the dharma does not see the dharma-constituent,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'o zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'o zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'o //
translated: and the dharma-constituent does not see the dharma.”

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the element of form does not see the element of dharmas.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The element of dharmas does not see the element of form.

original: rab 'byor tshor ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor tshor ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the element of feeling does not see the element of dharmas.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang tshor ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang tshor ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The element of dharmas does not see the element of feeling.

original: rab 'byor 'du shes kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'du shes kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the element of perception does not see the element of dharmas.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang 'du shes kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang 'du shes kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The element of dharmas does not see the element of perception.

original: rab 'byor 'du byed rnams kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'du byed rnams kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the element of volitional factors does not see the element of dharmas.

original: chos kyi dbyings @120b kyis kyang 'du byed rnams kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings @120b kyis kyang 'du byed rnams kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the realm of conditioned phenomena does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the realm of consciousness does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of consciousness.

original: rab 'byor mig gi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor mig gi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the realm of the eyes does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽rna ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the eyes.🔽The realm of the ears does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rna ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rna ba'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of phenomena does not see the realm of the ears.

original: sna'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: The realm of the nose does not see the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang sna'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lce'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang sna'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lce'i dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the nose element does not see the dharma-dhātu,🔽the tongue element does not see the dharma-dhātu,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang lce'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽lus kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang lce'i dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lus kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the dharma-dhātu does not see the tongue element,🔽the body element does not see the dharma-dhātu,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang lus kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang lus kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the dharma-dhātu does not see the body element,

original: yid kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: the mind element does not see the dharma-dhātu,🔽and the dharma-dhātu does not see the mind element.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: This is the receptivity to the knowledge of the path.

original: rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi dbyings kyis 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi dbyings kyis 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, the compounded element does not see the uncompounded element,🔽and the uncompounded element does not see the compounded element.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyis kyang 'dus byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyis kyang 'dus byas kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'o //
translated: The unconditioned realm does not see the conditioned realm. This is the subsequent knowledge with regard to the path.

original: 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam la gdams pa'o //
translated: These are the instructions on the path of seeing.

original: rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi dbyings med par 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su gdags par mi nus /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi dbyings med par 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su gdags par mi nus /
translated: Subhūti, without the conditioned realm, the unconditioned realm cannot be designated.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings med par yang 'dus byas kyi dbyings su gdags par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings med par yang 'dus byas kyi dbyings su gdags par mi nus pa'o //
translated: Without the unconditioned realm, the conditioned realm cannot be designated.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see any phenomena.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: Since they do not see any phenomena, they are not frightened, do not become frightened, and will not become frightened.
They

original: sems chos gang la yang zhum par mi 'gyur yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems chos gang la yang zhum par mi 'gyur yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not be disheartened or regret it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, it is because when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see form,🔽they do not see feeling,

original: 'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see perception,

original: 'du byed rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see consciousness,

original: mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the eyes,

original: rna ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽sna yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sna yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the ears,🔽they do not see the nose,

original: lce yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lce yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the tongue,

original: lus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the body,

original: yid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: yid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: they do not see the thinking mind,

original: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see form as real.

original: sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /🔽dri yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / dri yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see sound as real.🔽He does not see smell as real.

original: ro yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ro yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see taste as real.🔽He does not see touch as real.

original: chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see mental objects as real.

original: sa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the earth element as real.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, or the consciousness element as real.

original: ma rig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see ignorance as real.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //🔽'dod chags yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'dod chags yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see volitional formations, consciousness, name and form, the six sense spheres, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth, or old age and death.🔽He does not see desire.

original: zhe sdang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: zhe sdang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see hatred.

original: gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see confusion.

original: bdag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bdag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see a self.

original: sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see a being, a living being, a person, an individual, a human, a human being, one who acts, one who feels, one who knows, or one who sees.

original: 'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams @121b yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams @121b yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the formless realm.

original: nyan thos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nyan thos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the śrāvakas.

original: rang sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the pratyekabuddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the bodhisattvas.

original: nyan thos kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the śrāvaka Dharma.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the pratyekabuddha Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the bodhisattva Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see the Buddha Dharma.

original: byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see awakening.

original: byang chub kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas /
translated: He does not see the Dharma of awakening.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: and he does not see any dharma at all, up to and including all mundane and supramundane dharmas.

original: de chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And because he does not see any dharma at all, he does not tremble, is not frightened, and is not terrified.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba lags /
translated: “Why, Lord, does the bodhisattva not tremble?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is because bodhisattva great beings do not apprehend and do not see mind and mental factor dharmas.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhūti, in that way the bodhisattva does not tremble,

original: kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and does not become timid.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,🔽“Lord, how does the bodhisattva not tremble?”

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lags /
translated: “Lord, how is it that the minds of bodhisattva great beings do not get cowed?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yid dang yid kyi khams mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yid dang yid kyi khams mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is because bodhisattva great beings do not apprehend the mind and do not see the mind-constituent as real.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid dngang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid dngang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is in that way that the minds of bodhisattva great beings do not get cowed.

original: rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par byas te /🔽rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @122a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par byas te / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @122a * //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should practice the perfection of wisdom by not apprehending all dharmas.

original: pa'i tshe / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: pa'i tshe / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /
translated: Subhūti, if, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the perfection of wisdom, they do not apprehend that perfection of wisdom,

original: byang chub sems dpa' de yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de yang mi dmigs /
translated: that bodhisattva is not apprehended,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang mi dmigs /
translated: and that name ‘bodhisattva’ is also not apprehended,

original: byang chub sems dpa' de yang mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de yang mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
translated: and that bodhisattva is also not apprehended and not seen,

original: 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gdams ngag yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gdams ngag yin te /
translated: this is the instruction for bodhisattva great beings,

original: 'di nyid rjes su bstan pa yin no //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: 'di nyid rjes su bstan pa yin no // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: this is the teaching.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom ldan 'das gzugs yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das gzugs yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:🔽“Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to know form should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to know feeling should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'du shes yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'du shes yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who want to know perception should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who want to know volitional factors should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who want to know consciousness should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das mig yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mig yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das lce yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

translated: Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully understand mind consciousness should train in the perfection of wisdom.”

translated: They should train in the perfection of wisdom if they want to fully understand ear contact and feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, nose contact and feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, tongue contact and feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully understand the earth element should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽They should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully understand the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully understand the eye constituent, the form constituent, and the eye consciousness constituent should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽They should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
translated: “Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully understand the ear constituent, the sound constituent, and the ear consciousness constituent, the nose constituent, the smell constituent, and the nose consciousness constituent, the tongue constituent, the taste constituent, and the tongue consciousness constituent, the body constituent, the tangible-object constituent, and the body consciousness constituent, the thinking-mind constituent, the dharma constituent, and the thinking-mind consciousness constituent should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yongs su shes par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully understand old age, death, grief, lamentations, pain, mental anguish, and disturbances should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Lord, bodhisattva great beings who want to abandon desire, anger, and delusion should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / @123b the tshom dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / @123b the tshom dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /
translated: Similarly, bodhisattva great beings who want to abandon the view of the perishable collection, the overesteeming of mere morality and asceticism, doubt, desire for the desire realm, malice, desire for the form realm, and desire for the formless realm should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba spang par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽sbyor ba bzhi dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdud pa bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / phyin ci log bzhi spang bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: gang nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba spang par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // sbyor ba bzhi dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdud pa bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / phyin ci log bzhi spang bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who wish to abandon the four attachments, the four faults, the four errors, the four bonds, the four fetters, the four taints, the four perversions, the four dark actions, the four verbal nonvirtues, the four mental nonvirtues, the four kinds of degeneration, the four kinds of heedlessness, the four kinds of craving, the four kinds of conceit, the four kinds of grasping, and the four kinds of clinging should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽“The bodhisattva great beings who wish to abandon the four attachments, the four rivers, the four knots, the four kinds of grasping, and the four errors should train in the perfection of wisdom.”🔽

original: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spang bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who wish to complete the path of the ten virtuous actions should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the four establishments in mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties,

original: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: the five powers, the seven parts of awakening, the eightfold noble path, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the four fearlessnesses, the six clairvoyances, the ten tathāgata powers,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who wish to perfect the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha should train in the perfection of wisdom.🔽Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who wish to attain the meditative absorption called ‘awakening factors’ should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the Chinese samadhi, the samadhi of the moon's light, the samadhi of the moon's victory banner, the samadhi of the seal of all phenomena, the samadhi of Avalokiteshvara's seal,🔽the samadhi of ascertainment in the dharmadhatu, the samadhi of the glory of the victory banner of ascertainment, the vajra-like samadhi, the samadhi of the gateway to engaging in all phenomena, the samadhi of the ocean of the sky treasury,

original: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: and the samadhi of the lion's play.

original: stobs rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad shes pa'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: stobs rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad shes pa'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the concentration of pure power, the concentration of perfect nobility, the concentration of the definitive words of all phenomena, the concentration of the seal of the knowledge of all aspects of phenomena,

original: chos thams cad kyi gzungs kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad nyams pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i rnam pa rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i gnas la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi gzungs kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad nyams pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i rnam pa rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i gnas la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the concentration of the dhāraṇī gateway of all phenomena, the concentration of the non-deficiency of all phenomena, the concentration of the ocean of the aspects of the gathering of all phenomena, the concentration of abiding in the abode of space,

original: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad ma lus par sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad ma lus par sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of complete purity of the three spheres, the samādhi of following without loss of superknowledge, the samādhi of becoming a vessel, the samādhi of the victory banner’s crest jewel, the samādhi of burning all afflictions without exception,

original: bdud bzhi'i dpung sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa rnam par grol ba gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i dpung sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa rnam par grol ba gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of dispelling the four māras’ armies, the samādhi of the lamp of wisdom, the samādhi of the superiority of the power of the ten powers, the samādhi of being unstained by attachment like space, and the samādhi of liberation.

original: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: Blessed One, bodhisattva mahāsattvas who wish to attain these and other samādhis should train in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who wish to fulfill the wishes of all sentient beings should train in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang @124b yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngan song rnams su mi ltung zhing rigs dma' bar mi skye ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rtse mo'i skyon du mi ltung ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang @124b yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngan song rnams su mi ltung zhing rigs dma' bar mi skye ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rtse mo'i skyon du mi ltung ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who wish to perfect all roots of virtue so that they do not fall into the lower realms, are not born in low-caste families, do not remain in the states of the hearers and solitary buddhas, and do not fall into the faults of the peak of existence should train in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtse mo'i skyon du ltung ba yin /🔽de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtse mo'i skyon du ltung ba yin / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, how does a bodhisattva great being fall into the error of the peak?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The venerable Subhūti having been thus addressed said to the venerable Śāriputra,🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections without skill in means, not knowing skillful means, rely on the emptiness meditative stabilization,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing thabs mkhas pa mi shes pa bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing thabs mkhas pa mi shes pa bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te /
translated: the signless meditative stabilization, and the wishless meditative stabilization,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la /
translated: they do not fall to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtse mo'i skyon zhes brjod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtse mo'i skyon zhes brjod do //
translated: That is called the ‘fault of the peak’ of the bodhisattva great being.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon du 'gyur /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon du 'gyur /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, why is that a fault for a bodhisattva great being?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,🔽Venerable Śāriputra, a ‘fault’ of a bodhisattva great being is this: craving for dharmas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste chos la sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni sgom pa'i lam la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste chos la sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni sgom pa'i lam la gdams pa'o //
translated: This is instruction on the path of meditation.

original: gdams ngag bshad zin to //
analyzed: gdams ngag bshad zin to //
translated: Instruction has been explained.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos la sred pa gang yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos la sred pa gang yin /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, what is craving for dharmas?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas @125a * //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas @125a * //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, here when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they are attached to, dwell on, and understand the idea that form is impermanent, and they are attached to, dwell on, and understand the idea that it is suffering, empty, and not a self.🔽They are attached to, dwell on, and understand the idea that form is empty and that it is wishless, and they are attached to, dwell on, and understand the idea that feeling, perception, formation,

original: pa dang / kun shes pa dang / gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
analyzed: pa dang / kun shes pa dang / gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
translated: and consciousness are impermanent, and they are attached to, dwell on, and understand the idea that they are suffering, empty, and not a self.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang /
translated: and to settle down in, to fully understand, and to think, ‘Form is suffering, empty, signless, and wishless,’ to settle down in, and to fully understand, and to think, ‘Form is void, isolated, and non-existent,’ to settle down in, and to fully understand, and to think, ‘Form is afflicted,🔽and to settle down in, and to fully understand, and to think, ‘Consciousness is empty,’ and ‘is wishless,’ to settle down in, and to fully understand, this, Śāriputra, is a bodhisattva great being’s craving for dharmas that accord with the Dharma, which is a fault.

original: kun shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa 'di ni sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i dbang du byas nas drod chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: kun shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa dang / lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa 'di ni sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i dbang du byas nas drod chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of the weak heat stage, in terms of the truth of suffering.

original: gzugs 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
translated: “Form should be abandoned in this way.

original: 'dis gzugs spang bar bya'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa dang / tshor ba 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //🔽'dis tshor ba spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis gzugs spang bar bya'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa dang / tshor ba 'di ltar spang bar bya'o // 'dis tshor ba spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
translated: “This is form to be abandoned,” and so on up to: “This is consciousness to be abandoned.”🔽“This is feeling to be abandoned,” and so on up to: “This is consciousness to be abandoned.”

original: 'dis 'du shes spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis 'du shes spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
translated: “This is perception to be abandoned,” and so on up to: “This is consciousness to be abandoned.”

original: 'dis 'du byed rnams spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis 'du byed rnams spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
translated: “These are volitions to be abandoned,” and so on up to: “This is consciousness to be abandoned.”🔽“This is consciousness to be abandoned,” and so on up to: “This is consciousness to be abandoned.”

original: 'dis rnam par shes pa spang bar bya'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa dang / sdug bsngal 'di ltar yongs su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis rnam par shes pa spang bar bya'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa dang / sdug bsngal 'di ltar yongs su shes par bya'o //
translated: “This is suffering to be fully known,” and so on up to: “This is the path to be cultivated.”

original: 'dis sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o //
translated: “This is suffering to be fully known,” and so on up to: “This is the path to be cultivated.”

original: kun 'byung ba 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba 'di ltar spang bar bya'o //
translated: “This is the origin to be abandoned,” and so on up to: “This is the path to be cultivated.”

original: 'dis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung gi bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i drod du gtogs pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: 'dis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung gi bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i drod du gtogs pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: this is the origination of suffering that is being abandoned, this is the origination of suffering that has been abandoned.

original: 'gog pa 'di ltar mngon du bya'o //🔽'dis 'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba dang lam 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o //🔽'dis lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa 'di ltar mngon du bya'o // 'dis 'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba dang lam 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o // 'dis lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: This is the cessation of suffering that is to be realized,🔽this is the cessation of suffering that is being realized, this is the cessation of suffering that has been realized.🔽This is the path that is to be developed,

original: 'di ni rnam par @125b byang ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos 'di dag ni bsten par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par @125b byang ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos 'di dag ni bsten par bya'o //
translated: this is the path that is being developed, this is the path that has been developed.🔽This is defilement,🔽this is purification.🔽These dharmas are to be practiced,

original: chos 'di dag ni bsten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'di la ni spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni bsten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'di la ni spyad par bya'o //
translated: these dharmas are not to be practiced.🔽This is to be cultivated,

original: 'di la ni spyad par mi bya'o //🔽lam 'di dag ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni spyad par mi bya'o // lam 'di dag ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: this is not to be cultivated.🔽These are the paths that are to be developed,

original: 'di dag ni bsgom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni bsgom par mi bya'o //
translated: these are the paths that are not to be developed.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o //
translated: This is the training of the bodhisattvas.

original: 'di ni bslab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni bslab pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the training.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ perfection of generosity.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of moral discipline.🔽This is the perfection of patience.

original: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of perseverance.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration.

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the bodhisattvas’ perfection of generosity.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //🔽'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the perfection of moral discipline.🔽This is not the perfection of patience.

original: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the perfection of perseverance.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the perfection of concentration.

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'o //
translated: This is the skill in means of the bodhisattvas.

original: 'di ni thabs mkhas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni thabs mkhas pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the skill in means.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa'o //
translated: This is the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.🔽This is a fault.’

original: 'di ni skyon du 'gyur ba'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtse mo'i skyon no //
analyzed: 'di ni skyon du 'gyur ba'o zhes mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang kun shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtse mo'i skyon no //
translated: This, Subhūti, is the fault of the bodhisattva great beings at the peak.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: If, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos 'di dag la 'di ltar mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no //
analyzed: chos 'di dag la 'di ltar mngon par zhen pa dang lhag par gnas pa dang / kun shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon yin no //
translated: they settle down on, become fixated on, and fully understand these dharmas, this is the craving for the concordant dharmas of the bodhisattva great beings, and it is a fault.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa gang yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa gang yin /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ flawlessness?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, here when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they do not see inner emptiness as outer emptiness,🔽they do not see outer emptiness as inner emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid du yang dag @126a * //🔽par rjes su mi mthong /🔽phyi stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid du yang dag @126a * // par rjes su mi mthong / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see outer emptiness as outer emptiness,🔽they do not see inner emptiness as outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see emptiness of emptiness as outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽chen po stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chen po stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see emptiness as the emptiness of the external and the internal.🔽They do not see emptiness as the emptiness of the great.🔽They do not see the emptiness of the great as emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the ultimate as the emptiness of the great.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the great as the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They do not see the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the ultimate as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of conditioned phenomena in the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽They do not see the emptiness of the unconditioned in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is beyond extremes in the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽They do not see the emptiness of the unconditioned in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽They do not see the emptiness of what is beyond extremes in the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of beginningless and endless as the emptiness of non-repudiation.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-repudiation as the emptiness of beginningless and endless.🔽They do not see the emptiness of nature as the emptiness of non-repudiation.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-repudiation as the emptiness of nature.🔽They do not see the emptiness of all phenomena as the emptiness of nature.🔽They do not see the emptiness of nature as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong @126b pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong @126b pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of defining characteristics as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of defining characteristics as the emptiness of defining characteristics in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-apprehension as the emptiness of defining characteristics in the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They do not see the emptiness of defining characteristics as the emptiness of non-apprehension in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities as the emptiness of non-apprehension in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-apprehension as the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽They do not see the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities as the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽dngos po stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things as the emptiness of non-things.🔽They do not see the emptiness of things as the emptiness of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-things as the emptiness of things.

original: rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid la dngos po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid la dngos po stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of its own entity as the emptiness of things.

original: dngos po stong pa nyid la rang gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /🔽gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid la rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
analyzed: dngos po stong pa nyid la rang gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid la rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
translated: They do not see the emptiness of things as the emptiness of its own entity.🔽They do not see the emptiness of the entity of another as the emptiness of its own entity.

original: rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of its own entity as the emptiness of the entity of another.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i dro ba chung ngu'i dmigs pa🔽dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
