analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i dro ba chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of the small heat of the truth of cessation.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should train as follows:

original: slob pa'i tshe ci nas kyang gzugs shes par bya ste /
analyzed: slob pa'i tshe ci nas kyang gzugs shes par bya ste /
translated: ‘While training, I will know form,

original: gzugs des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but I will not be conceited about that form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste /
translated: I will know feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but I will not be conceited about them.

original: mig shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mig shes par bya ste /
translated: I will know the eyes,

original: mig des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: mig des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but I will not be conceited about those eyes.

original: de bzhin du @127a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du @127a * //
translated: In the same way,

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shes par bya ste /
translated: one should know the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind,

original: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud because of them.

original: gzugs shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know form,

original: des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud because of it.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas,

original: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud because of them.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the perfection of giving,

original: des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud because of it.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud because of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga dang / mig lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga dang / mig lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, the five superknowledges, the five eyes, and the four establishments of mindfulness should be known,

original: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o /
translated: but one should not become proud on account of them.

original: // / bam po dgu pa yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: // / bam po dgu pa yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya ste /
translated: The four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of awakening, and the eightfold noble path should be known,

original: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud on account of them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste /
translated: The ten powers of the Tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha should be known,

original: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not become proud on account of them.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, it is thus that bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba shes par bya ste /
translated: should know what is called the thought of awakening,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba dang / rlabs po che'i sems zhes bya ba shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba dang / rlabs po che'i sems zhes bya ba shes par bya ste /
translated: should know what is called the thought of equality with the unequaled, and should know what is called the thought of greatness.

original: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: But they should not be conceited about them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar sems de sems ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems de sems ma yin te /
translated: Because that thought is not a thought,

original: sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the thought is clear light.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: ” Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba yang gang yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba yang gang yin /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, what is the clear light nature of the thought?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems gang 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sems gang 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the thought is not conjoined with or disjoined from greed,

original: zhe sdang dang ldan pa ma @127b yin bral ba ma yin /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang ldan pa ma @127b yin bral ba ma yin /
translated: is not conjoined with or disjoined from hatred,🔽is not conjoined with or disjoined from confusion,

original: gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin /
analyzed: gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin /
translated: It is not associated with or dissociated from ignorance.

original: kun nas ldang ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin /
analyzed: kun nas ldang ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin /
translated: It is not associated with or dissociated from the entanglements.

original: dmigs pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang / bag la nyal ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: dmigs pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang / bag la nyal ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang /
translated: It is not associated with or dissociated from the objects of perception. It is not associated with or dissociated from the latent impulses. It is not associated with or dissociated from the fetters.

original: lta bar byas pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: lta bar byas pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa ma yin bral ba ma yin pa 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: It is not associated with or dissociated from the views. It is not associated with or dissociated from the thoughts of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas. This, Śāriputra, is the luminous nature of the mind of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems gang zhig sems med pa zhes bya ba de yod dam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems gang zhig sems med pa zhes bya ba de yod dam /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, is there a mind that is called ‘mindless’?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, is there a dharma that is called ‘mindless’?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa nyid gang yin pa de la yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa nyid gang yin pa de la yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par 'gyur ram /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, is that which is simply not the mind existent or nonexistent, or is it apprehensible?”

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no //
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, it is not.”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gal te sems med pa nyid de la yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid med pa'am mi dmigs pa yin na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gal te sems med pa nyid de la yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid med pa'am mi dmigs pa yin na /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, if that which is simply not the mind is nonexistent or nonapprehensible,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis sems gang zhig sems med pa zhes bya ba de yod dam zhes de skad du smras pa 'am dri ba 'di 'thad dam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis sems gang zhig sems med pa zhes bya ba de yod dam zhes de skad du smras pa 'am dri ba 'di 'thad dam /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, is it tenable to ask, ‘Is the mind that is called not the mind existent or nonexistent?’”

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa nyid gang yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa nyid gang yin /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, what is not the mind?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,🔽“Venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu chos rnams chos nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sems med pa yin te 'di ni sems med pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu chos rnams chos nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sems med pa yin te 'di ni sems med pa zhes brjod do //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the intrinsic nature of dharmas is unchanging and nonconceptual. That is without mind. That is said to be ‘without mind.’

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de kho na bzhin du gzugs kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de kho na bzhin du gzugs kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual, is form also unchanging and nonconceptual in just that way?

original: tshor ba yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: tshor ba yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is feeling unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: 'du shes kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is perception unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: 'du byed rnams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are volitional factors unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: rnam par shes pa yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Is consciousness unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de kho na bzhin du mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi @128a * //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi @128a * //
translated: Just as the eye constituent and the form constituent

original: khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the element of the mental faculty and the element of mental consciousness also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the element of the ear, the element of sound, and the element of auditory consciousness also unchanging and nonconceptual?🔽Are the element of the nose, the element of smell, and the element of olfactory consciousness also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the element of the tongue, the element of taste, and the element of gustatory consciousness also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the element of the body, the element of tactility, and the element of tactile consciousness also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the mind constituent, the entity constituent, and the mind consciousness constituent also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: de bzhin du skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
translated: Are the sense domains, the constituents, dependent origination, the perfections, the superknowledges, the establishments of mindfulness, the abandonments, the legs of manifestation,

original: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nas /
analyzed: dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nas /
translated: the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: up to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, is unchanging and non-conceptual?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin te /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, it is so.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and non-conceptual, so too the aggregates, elements, sense fields, dependent origination, perfections, superknowledges,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nas /
translated: dharmas on the side of awakening, ten powers of the tathāgatas, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @128b byang chub kyi bar yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @128b byang chub kyi bar yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: up to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, are unchanging and non-conceptual.”🔽“Subhūti, what do you think?

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra said to the venerable Subhūti, “Excellent, Subhūti!

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so //
translated: Excellent, Subhūti!

original: 'di ltar yang khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras /
translated: You are the son of the Blessed One,

original: thugs las skyes pa /
analyzed: thugs las skyes pa /
translated: born from his mind,

original: zhal nas byung ba /
analyzed: zhal nas byung ba /
translated: born from his mouth,

original: chos las skyes pa /
analyzed: chos las skyes pa /
translated: born from Dharma,

original: chos kyi sprul pa /
analyzed: chos kyi sprul pa /
translated: an emanation of Dharma,

original: chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zang zing gi bgo skal la spyod pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zang zing gi bgo skal la spyod pa ma yin pa /
translated: enjoying the portion of Dharma, not enjoying the portion of material things,

original: mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa chos rnams lus kyis mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa chos rnams lus kyis mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: endowed with the eye of direct perception, one who has actualized the dharmas with his body.

original: ji ltar nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu gsungs pa zhes bya ba ltar 'di nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: ji ltar nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu gsungs pa zhes bya ba ltar 'di nye bar bstan to //
translated: This has been taught by you, just as the Blessed One, the foremost of those who dwell without afflictions, has declared you to be the foremost.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of wisdom like that.”

original: de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yang brtag par bya zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lam gyi bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i drod du gtogs pa
analyzed: de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yang brtag par bya zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lam gyi bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i drod du gtogs pa
translated: “Therefore, you should also investigate the irreversible bodhisattva great beings and know that they are not separated from the perfection of wisdom.”

original: chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of the lesser heat stage🔽in terms of the truth of the path.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya /🔽gzung bar bya /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya / gzung bar bya /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, those who wish to train in the śrāvaka level should also listen to this perfection of wisdom,🔽hold it,

original: bcang bar bya /🔽klag par bya /
analyzed: bcang bar bya / klag par bya /
translated: keep it,🔽read it,

original: kun chub par bya /
analyzed: kun chub par bya /
translated: master it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
translated: and properly pay attention to it.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyis la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya /🔽gzung bar bya /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyis la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya / gzung bar bya /
translated: Those who wish to train in the level of the pratyekabuddhas should listen to this perfection of wisdom,🔽they should bear it in mind,

original: bcang bar bya /🔽klag par bya /
analyzed: bcang bar bya / klag par bya /
translated: they should keep it,🔽they should read it,

original: kun chub par bya /
analyzed: kun chub par bya /
translated: they should master it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
translated: and they should properly pay attention to it.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya /🔽gzung bar bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya / gzung bar bya /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who wish to train in the bodhisattva levels should listen to this perfection of wisdom,🔽they should bear it in mind,

original: bcang bar bya /🔽klag par bya /
analyzed: bcang bar bya / klag par bya /
translated: they should keep it,🔽they should read it,

original: kun chub par bya /
analyzed: kun chub par bya /
translated: they should master it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
translated: and they should properly pay attention to it.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya /🔽gzung bar bya /🔽bcang bar bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya / gzung bar bya / bcang bar bya /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who wish to train in the level of the buddhas should listen to this perfection of wisdom,🔽they should bear it in mind,

original: klag par bya /🔽kun @129a * //🔽chub par bya /
analyzed: klag par bya / kun @129a * // chub par bya /
translated: they should keep it,🔽they should read it,🔽they should master it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
translated: and they should properly pay attention to it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am / byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because in this perfection of wisdom the three vehicles are revealed in detail, in which the bodhisattva great beings should train: the vehicle of the śrāvakas, the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas, and the vehicle of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum po rnams rgya cher bstan to zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rgyu nyid kyi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum po rnams rgya cher bstan to zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rgyu nyid kyi khyad par yin no //
translated: This is the distinction of being the cause of all.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: “Lord, I do not understand, do not apprehend, and do not see the bodhisattva and the perfection of wisdom.

original: des na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhig gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: des na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhig gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
translated: Therefore, Blessed One, to which bodhisattva should we give instructions in the perfection of wisdom, and to which bodhisattva should we teach it?

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gang lags pas ni dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gang lags pas ni dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
translated: Blessed One, since I do not know, do not see, and do not observe any thing,

original: bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i bdag des chos gang gis chos gang zhig la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i bdag des chos gang gis chos gang zhig la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi ste /
translated: Blessed One, how could I, not knowing, not seeing, and not observing any thing, give instructions in any Dharma to any Dharma?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ba lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ba lags so //
translated: Blessed One, this would be a source of regret for me.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhe'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhe'am /
translated: Blessed One, while not knowing, not seeing, and not observing any Dharma, I would be giving instructions in the perfection of wisdom to a bodhisattva, and teaching it to a bodhisattva.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ming tsam gyis 'du ba dang 'god par bgyis na de nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ming tsam gyis 'du ba dang 'god par bgyis na de nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If I were to cause it to be collected and set forth by the mere name ‘perfection of wisdom,’ that would be my regret.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, it is so, but that name does not abide,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it does not not abide,🔽it is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: and it is not not free from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That name does not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Thus, that name does not abide,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it does not not abide,🔽it is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and it is not not free from abiding.🔽Blessed One, I do not know, do not see, and do not observe the collection and setting forth of form.

original: bcom @129b ldan 'das bdag gis tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom @129b ldan 'das bdag gis tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not know, do not see, and do not observe the collection and setting forth of feeling.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'du shes kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'du byed rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'du shes kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'du byed rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not know, do not see, and do not consider the convergence and divergence of perceptions.🔽Blessed One, I do not know, do not see, and do not consider the convergence and divergence of volitions.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: Blessed One, I do not know, do not see, and do not consider the convergence and divergence of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gang lags pas gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gang lags pas gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
translated: Blessed One, since I do not know, do not see, and do not consider the convergence and divergence of form and so forth, what is it that is designated as a bodhisattva?

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis kyang ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /🔽mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis kyang ming de yang gnas pa ma lags / mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, by this explanation, that name does not abide,🔽it does not not abide,🔽it is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: and it is not not free from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That name does not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Thus, that name is not existent,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it is not nonexistent,🔽it is not both existent and nonexistent,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: and it is not neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sna'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sna'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the eyes.🔽Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the ears.🔽Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the nose.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lce'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lce'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the tongue.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lus kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lus kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the body.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yid kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yid kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence and divergence of the mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems @130a * //🔽dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems @130a * // dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
translated: Blessed One, while I do not apprehend or see the convergence and divergence of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind, what is it that I should designate as ‘a bodhisattva’?🔽Blessed One, the name of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind is not something that abides,

original: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /🔽mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags / mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: nor is it something that does not abide.🔽It is not something that is free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: nor is it something that is not free from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: ming de rnams ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ming de rnams ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Because those names do not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas ba ma lags /🔽mi gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas ba ma lags / mi gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Thus, those names do not abide,🔽nor do they not abide.

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: They are not something that is free from abiding,🔽nor are they something that is not free from abiding.

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: It is not that it is not free from abiding.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of form.

original: de bzhin du spra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du spra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: Similarly, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
translated: Blessed One, while I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of form, sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental phenomena, what is it that I should designate as a bodhisattva?

original: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, however, that name does not abide,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: nor does it not abide.🔽It is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: nor is it not free from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That name does not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
translated: In that case, that name is not abiding,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags /
translated: it is not non-abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and it is not free from not abiding.🔽Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence and divergence of eye consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, I do not apprehend or see the convergence and divergence of ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and mind consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par @130b shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par @130b shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
translated: Blessed One, without apprehending and without seeing the convergence and dispersal of the eye consciousness, the ear consciousness, the nose consciousness, the tongue consciousness, the body consciousness, and the mind consciousness, what is it that we refer to when we say ‘bodhisattva’?

original: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, however, that name does not abide,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: nor does it not abide.🔽It is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: nor is it not free from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That name does not exist.

original: de ltar ming de gnas pa ma lags /🔽mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar ming de gnas pa ma lags / mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: Thus, that name does not abide,🔽nor does it not abide.🔽It is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so//
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so//
translated: nor is it not free from abiding.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of eye contact or of the feelings that arise from the condition of eye contact.🔽I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of ear contact or of the feelings that arise from the condition of ear contact.🔽I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of nose contact or of the feelings that arise from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of tongue contact or of the feelings that arise from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las skyes pa'i tshor ba'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the body sense base or the convergence or dispersal of the feeling that arises from the condition of the body sense base.🔽Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the mind sense base or the convergence or dispersal of the feeling that arises from the condition of the mind sense base.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa'i khams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa'i khams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, just as I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the earth element, in the same way I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, or the consciousness element.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar gyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma @131a * //🔽dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis ma rig pa 'gag pa nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar gyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma @131a * // dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis ma rig pa 'gag pa nas /
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of anything from ignorance up to old age and death.

original: rga shi 'gags pa'i bar gyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: rga shi 'gags pa'i bar gyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the cessation of ignorance up to the cessation of old age and death.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the aggregates, elements, sense bases, or dependent origination.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of desire, anger, or ignorance.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kun nas ldang ba dang / sgrib pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / lta bar byas pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kun nas ldang ba dang / sgrib pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / lta bar byas pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the afflictions, obscurations, latent tendencies, fetters, and views.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the perfection of generosity.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the perfection of discipline.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the perfection of patience.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: “Lord, I do not apprehend and do not see the convergence and divergence of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: “Lord, I do not apprehend and do not see the convergence and divergence of the perfection of concentration.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: “Lord, I do not apprehend and do not see the convergence and divergence of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bdag gi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bdag gi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: “Lord, I do not apprehend and do not see the convergence and divergence of a self.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shing las skyes dang / shing bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor pa po dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shing las skyes dang / shing bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor pa po dang /
translated: “Lord, in the same way I do not apprehend and do not see a being, a living being, a creature, one who lives, a person, an individual, one born of Manu, a child of Manu, one who does, one who feels, one who knows, one who sees, a cognizer, or a bodhisattva.

original: shes pa po @131b dang / mthong ba po rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa po @131b dang / mthong ba po rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the one who knows and the one who sees.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the applications of mindfulness.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, likewise, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, branches of awakening, and path.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam gtan bzhi rnams dang / tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam gtan bzhi rnams dang / tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, or the four formless absorptions.🔽Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the mindfulness of the Buddha, the mindfulness of the Dharma, the mindfulness of the Saṅgha, the mindfulness of morality, the mindfulness of giving, or the mindfulness of the gods.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the mindfulness of inhalation and exhalation.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig lnga rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig lnga rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the five eyes, the clairvoyances, the fearlessnesses, or the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /
translated: Blessed One, if I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, then with respect to what should I designate a name, saying ‘bodhisattva’?

original: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas @132a * //🔽pa ma lags /🔽mi gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas @132a * // pa ma lags / mi gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, however, that name does not abide🔽nor does it not abide,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: nor does it both abide and not abide,🔽nor does it neither abide nor not abide.

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: It is not not separated from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If one were to ask why,

original: ming de ma mchis pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pa'i phyir te /
translated: it is because that name does not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Thus, that name is not abiding,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it is not non-abiding,🔽it is not separated from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: and it is not not separated from abiding.🔽Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the five grasping heaps that are like a dream.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the five grasping heaps that are like an illusion, like a mirage, like a phantom city, like an echo, like a hallucination, like a reflection of the moon in water, or like a magical creation.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, I do not apprehend or see the engagement and establishment of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and of the absence of arising, absence of cessation, absence of entities, absence of nonentities, absence of affliction, and absence of purification.🔽Blessed One, in the same way, I do not apprehend or see the engagement and establishment of the expanse of reality, suchness, the very limit of reality, the establishment of phenomena, and the faultless nature of phenomena.🔽

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho pa dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho pa dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
