original: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of any phenomena, whether afflicted or unafflicted, mundane or supramundane, conditioned or unconditioned, or associated with the afflictions or with purification.

original: 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams thams cad kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams thams cad kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of any phenomena, whether of saṃsāra or nirvāṇa.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos @132b rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos @132b rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of any phenomena, whether of the past, present, or future.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the gathering and dispersion of the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas in the world systems of the eastern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, together with their saṅghas of hearers and their saṅghas of bodhisattvas.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang /
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, I do not apprehend or see the gathering and dispersion of the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas in the world systems of the southern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the western direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the northern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the northeastern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the southeastern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the southwestern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the northwestern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the downward direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, nor in the world systems of the upward direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges.

original: lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
analyzed: lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
translated: and the world systems above, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, the tathāgatas, arhats, and samyaksaṃbuddhas together with their saṅgha of śrāvakas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: and together with their saṅgha of bodhisattvas, I do not apprehend their gathering and dispersing, and I do not see them.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
translated: Bhagavān, I do not apprehend the tathāgatas, arhats, and samyaksaṃbuddhas together with their saṅgha of śrāvakas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhig gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhig gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan
translated: “Blessed One, if the gathering and arrangement of the thus-gone ones, the worthy ones, the perfect buddhas, together with the saṅgha of bodhisattvas, are not apprehended and are not seen, then what bodhisattva should be instructed and guided in what perfection of wisdom?

original: par bgyi / bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: par bgyi / bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, however, that name does not abide,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it does not not abide,🔽it is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: and it is not not free from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That name does not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Thus, that name does not abide,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it does not not abide,🔽it is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: and it is not not free from abiding.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'du @133a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'du @133a * //
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend the suchness of all phenomena as being gathered or arranged.

original: ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhig gdams par bgyi zhing rjes
analyzed: ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'du ba dang 'god pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhig gdams par bgyi zhing rjes
translated: I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the reality of all phenomena.

original: su bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: su bstan par bgyi /
translated: Blessed One, while I do not apprehend or see the convergence or dispersal of the reality of all phenomena, what bodhisattva and what perfection of wisdom should I instruct and demonstrate?

original: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the name of the reality of all phenomena does not abide,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it does not not abide,🔽it is not free from abiding,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: and it is not not free from abiding.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pa ste /
translated: That name does not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags /🔽mi gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma lags / mi gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Thus, that name does not abide,🔽it does not not abide,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: it is not free from abiding,🔽and it is not not free from abiding.

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so zhes bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so zhes bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa yin no //
translated: This is the object and aspect of the middle stage of warmth.

original: bcom ldan 'das brda dang ldan pa'i chos btags pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das brda dang ldan pa'i chos btags pa 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, this designation of a Dharma that is a conventional expression, namely,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de yang phung po'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de yang phung po'am /
translated: ‘bodhisattva,’ is not to be expressed by any of the aggregates,

original: khams sam / skye mched dam /
analyzed: khams sam / skye mched dam /
translated: elements, or sense bases,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi par gang gis kyang brjod par bgyi ba ma lags te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi par gang gis kyang brjod par bgyi ba ma lags te /
translated: up to and including the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: chos su btags pa tsam du bas so //
analyzed: chos su btags pa tsam du bas so //
translated: It is merely a designation of a Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming de gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming de gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: Blessed One, for example, the name ‘dream’ is not to be expressed by anything.

original: sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//
translated: The names ‘illusion,’ ‘echo,’ ‘optical aberration,’ ‘mirage,’ ‘reflection of the moon in water,’ and ‘transformation of the tathāgatas’ are not to be expressed by anything.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The names of earth, water, fire, wind, and space cannot be expressed by anything.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The names of discipline, concentration, wisdom, liberation, and the vision of the wisdom of liberation cannot be expressed by anything.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name 'stream-enterer' cannot be expressed by anything.

original: lan cig phyir 'od pa zhes bgyi ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba dang / rang byang chub ces bgyi @133b ba nas /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'od pa zhes bgyi ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba dang / rang byang chub ces bgyi @133b ba nas /
translated: The names 'once-returner', 'non-returner', 'arhat', and 'individual enlightenment' up to

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang / de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni dge ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang / de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni dge ba'am /
translated: The names “bodhisattva,” “tathāgata,” “buddha,” “suchness,” and “qualities of a buddha” are all virtuous.

original: mi dge ba'am /🔽kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: mi dge ba'am / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am /
translated: The names ‘bodhisattva’, ‘tathāgata’, ‘buddha’, ‘suchness’, and ‘qualities of the Buddha’ are not described by anything virtuous or non-virtuous,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am /
translated: blamable or blameless,

original: bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: pleasant or unpleasant,

original: bdag gam / bdag med pa'am /
analyzed: bdag gam / bdag med pa'am /
translated: self or non-self,

original: zhi ba'am / ma zhi ba'am /
analyzed: zhi ba'am / ma zhi ba'am /
translated: peaceful or not peaceful,

original: dben pa'am / mi dben pa'am /🔽mtshan ma yod pa'am /
analyzed: dben pa'am / mi dben pa'am / mtshan ma yod pa'am /
translated: isolated or not isolated,

original: mtshan ma med pa'am /🔽dngos po yod pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'am / dngos po yod pa'am /
translated: with signs or signless,

original: dngos med pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos med pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: substantial or insubstantial.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di yang mthong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di yang mthong ste /
translated: Blessed One, I see this meaning and I see this principle.

original: 'di skad ces bdag gis chos thams cad ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ming tsam gyis 'du ba dang 'god par bgyis na /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bdag gis chos thams cad ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ming tsam gyis 'du ba dang 'god par bgyis na /
translated: He said, While I do not know, do not observe, and do not see any dharmas at all, if I were to assemble and arrange just names, such as 'bodhisattva' or 'perfection of wisdom,'

original: de nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ba lags so zhes gsol to //
analyzed: de nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ba lags so zhes gsol to //
translated: that would be a regret for me.

original: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de lta mod kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma lags /
translated: The Lord said, Still, that name does not stand,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: does not not stand,🔽is not free from standing,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: is not not free from standing.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ming de ma mchis pas de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma lags /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pas de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma lags /
translated: Because that name does not exist, thus that name does not stand,

original: mi gnas pa ma lags /🔽gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
analyzed: mi gnas pa ma lags / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags /
translated: does not not stand,🔽is not free from standing,

original: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
analyzed: gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa ma lags so //
translated: is not not free from standing.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong yid la 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par mi
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong yid la 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par mi
translated: Blessed One, if bodhisattva great beings are not disheartened, do not become discouraged, do not feel regret, and are not terrified, frightened, or seized by fear when the perfection of wisdom is explained in this way,🔽

original: 'gyur na / des na nges par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par rig par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: 'gyur na / des na nges par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par rig par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Blessed One, if the mind of a bodhisattva great being is not cowed when the perfection of wisdom is explained like this, if it is not afraid, does not hesitate, is not intimidated, and does not get scared, then, Blessed One, that bodhisattva great being should know that ‘I am irreversible from awakening, and I am standing on the irreversible bodhisattva bhūmi in the manner of not standing.’

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @134a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @134a * //
translated: “Blessed One, furthermore, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in form,

original: pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: should not stand in feeling,🔽should not stand in perception,🔽should not stand in volitional factors,🔽and should not stand in consciousness.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in feeling, perception, volitional formations, or consciousness.

original: des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the eye.

original: rna pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in a form.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in a sound, a smell, a taste, a feeling, or a dharma.

original: des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, or mind consciousness.

original: des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: the sense-­field of sound, or the sense-­field of auditory consciousness.🔽He should not stand in the sense-­field of the nose,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: the sense-­field of smell, or the sense-­field of olfactory consciousness.🔽He should not stand in the sense-­field of the tongue,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: the sense-­field of taste, or the sense-­field of gustatory consciousness.🔽He should not stand in the sense-­field of the body,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: the sense-­field of tangibles, or the sense-­field of tactile consciousness.🔽He should not stand in the sense-­field of the mind,

original: des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: the sense-­field of mental phenomena, or the sense-­field of mental consciousness.

original: des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
analyzed: des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
translated: He should not stand in the earth element,

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, or the consciousness element.

original: des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //🔽'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang /
analyzed: des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o // 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang /
translated: He should not stand in ignorance.🔽He should not stand in volitional formations, consciousness, name and form, the six sense fields, contact, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, old age and death,

original: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das @134b 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong /🔽tshor ba tshor bas stong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @134b 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba tshor bas stong /
translated: Because, Blessed One, form is empty of form.🔽Feeling is empty of feeling.

original: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong /
analyzed: 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong /
translated: Perception is empty of perception.

original: 'du byed rnams 'du byed rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams 'du byed rnams kyis stong /
translated: Formations are empty of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Consciousness is empty of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the emptiness of form is not form.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs ma mchis te /
translated: Form is not other than emptiness.

original: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
analyzed: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
translated: Form itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is form.

original: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the emptiness of feeling is not feeling.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang tshor ba ma mchis te /🔽tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang tshor ba ma mchis te / tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Feeling is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o //
translated: Feeling itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is feeling.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the emptiness of perception is not perception.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang 'du shes ma mchis te /🔽'du shes nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang 'du shes ma mchis te / 'du shes nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Perception is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so //
translated: Perception itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is perception.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed rnams ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed rnams ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the emptiness of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang 'du byed rnams ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang 'du byed rnams ma mchis te /
translated: The eye is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the eye.🔽The same goes for the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.🔽The emptiness of form is not other than form.🔽Form is not other than emptiness.

original: 'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is form.🔽The same goes for sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not the eye.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not other than the eye.🔽The eye is not other than emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is the eye.🔽The same goes for the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.🔽The emptiness of form is not other than form.🔽Form is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is form.🔽The same goes for sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not the eye.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not other than the eye.🔽The eye is not other than emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is the eye.🔽The same goes for the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.🔽The emptiness of form is not other than form.🔽Form is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Emptiness is form.🔽The same goes for sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not the eye.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not other than the eye.🔽The eye is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the eye.🔽The same goes for the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.🔽The emptiness of form is not other than form.🔽Form is not other than emptiness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: Emptiness is form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: The same goes for sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not the eye.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not other than the eye.🔽The eye is not other than emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste /
translated: Emptiness is the eye.

original: mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the eye is not the eye.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mig ma mchis te /🔽mig nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mig ma mchis te / mig nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The eye is not other than emptiness.🔽The eye itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mig go //🔽rna ba rna bas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mig go // rna ba rna bas stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the eye.🔽The ear is empty of the ear.

original: rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba ma lags /
analyzed: rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the ear is not the ear.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rna ba ma mchis te /🔽rna ba nyid stong pa nyid /🔽stong pa nyid @135a * //
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rna ba ma mchis te / rna ba nyid stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid @135a * //
translated: The ear is not other than emptiness.🔽The ear itself is emptiness.

original: nyid rna ba'o //🔽sna snas stong ste /
analyzed: nyid rna ba'o // sna snas stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the ear.🔽The nose is empty of the nose.

original: sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the nose is not the nose.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sna ma mchis te /🔽sna nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sna ma mchis te / sna nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The nose is not other than emptiness.🔽The nose itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sna'o //🔽lce lces stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sna'o // lce lces stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the nose.🔽The tongue is empty of the tongue.

original: lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce ma lags /
analyzed: lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the tongue is not the tongue.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang lce ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang lce ma mchis te /
translated: The tongue is not other than emptiness.

original: lce nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The tongue itself is emptiness.
